content: Adds a built-in require-by-string alias that always points to the root of the `Class.DataModel`: `@game`.
When the "Acoustic Simulation" beta feature is enabled, reduces the overhead from moving parts.
Adds support for `:not(...)`, `:has(...)` and `[$AttributeExists]` selectors to `Class.Instance:QueryDescendants()`.
Supports require-by-string access to non-service instances that are parented directly to the root of the `Class.DataModel`.
In Luau's New Type Solver, generics will be instantiated to more specific types when valid.
Fixes a bug where `Class.EncodingService:Base64Decode()` allowed malformed data to be successfully decoded with no error.
Adds `Class.GroupService:PromptJoinAsync()` to prompt a player to join a community in-experience.
Improves Luau buffer handling speed in `Class.HttpService:JSONEncode()` by 20-70% and in `Class.HttpService:JSONDecode()` by 20-140%.
Fixes an issue where a `Class.ModuleScript` could have been parented outside of the Sandbox container without sufficient capabilities.
In Luau's New Type Solver, `Library.table.isfrozen()` and `Library.table.clear()` functions should now more consistently accept unions of tables.
Creates new, separate 2500 requests/minute limit in `Class.HttpService` for Open Cloud requests.
In Luau's New Type Solver, prevents a class of crashes during inference when dealing with exceptionally large types.
Resolves issue of being unable to load `.rbxlx` files in some cases.
Fixes an autocomplete issue where anonymous functions with generic types were incorrectly suggested as arguments to higher-order functions.
Table `__tostring` metamethod will now be called for table keys in Output and other locations where a string representation is required.
Fixes an issue where `Class.UIScale` may sometimes not apply to some UI instances.
Fixes bug where `Class.DataModel.Close` signals weren't being executed if using deferred signals.
Changes `Class.SurfaceLight` to not make grass glow excessively when placed on large parts.
Updates the return type of `Class.Teams:GetTeams()` to an array of `Class.Team` objects instead of generic `Class.Instance|Instances`.
In Luau's New Type Solver, changes the signature for `types.newtable` to allow optional parameters.
Fixes an issue where `Class.UIStroke` line join mode is not respected when the `Class.GuiObject` has rounded corners.
Caches `Class.AudioEmitter` and `Class.AudioListener` `CFrames` per-frame to speed up panning-related 3D math.
Fixes a bug where `Class.AudioEmitter|AudioEmitters` and `Class.AudioListener|AudioListeners` parented to `Class.Camera|Cameras` would use their `CFrame` instead of their rendering-`CFrame`.
Fixes incorrect autocomplete suggestions for manually renamed services in require-by-string paths.
Fixes Explorer not working with debugger if a breakpoint hit on startup.
Fixes issue with `Class.WireframeHandleAdornment` text not being relative to the adornee.
In Luau's New Type Solver, explicitly defined generic pack arguments are now respected (previously they were ignored entirely).
The Move / Scale tools will now handle Snap to Parts correctly for primitive parts smaller than 0.05 studs, no longer leaving a gap.
